damage_cases.image_description: Front bumper damage on white 2019 Honda Civic - cracked plastic, paint scratches
damage_cases.damage_text: Minor front bumper impact damage. Plastic bumper cover has hairline crack on passenger side. Paint scratches visible but no structural damage.

damage_cases.image_description: Side door dent on blue 2020 Toyota Camry - door panel pushed in, no paint damage
damage_cases.damage_text: Door panel dent from parking lot incident. Metal deformation on driver side rear door. Paint intact with no scratches.

damage_cases.image_description: Rear-end collision damage on black 2018 BMW X5 - trunk crushed, taillights broken
damage_cases.damage_text: Severe rear-end collision damage. Trunk lid severely deformed and won't close. Both taillights shattered.

damage_cases.image_description: Windshield crack on red 2021 Ford F-150 - spider web crack from rock impact
damage_cases.damage_text: Windshield damage from road debris impact. Spider web crack pattern starting from passenger side.

damage_cases.image_description: Hail damage on silver 2019 Chevrolet Silverado - multiple dents on hood and roof
damage_cases.damage_text: Extensive hail damage from severe weather event. Multiple small to medium dents across hood, roof, and truck bed.

damage_cases.image_description: Scratch damage on white 2020 Tesla Model 3 - deep scratches along passenger side
damage_cases.damage_text: Vandalism damage with deep scratches along passenger side doors and quarter panel. Scratches penetrate through paint to primer.
